{"id":1474786105,"question_id":3267,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1733790822,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1474786105/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Longest Special Substring That Occurs Thrice I","memory":"10.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximumLength(string s) {\n        map<pair<char, int>, int> count;\n        int subLength = 0;\n        for(int start=0; start<s.length(); start++) {\n            char c = s[start];\n            subLength = 0;\n            for(int end=start; end<s.length(); end++) {\n                if(c==s[end]) {\n                    subLength++;\n                    count[{c, subLength}]++;\n                } else\n                    break;\n            };\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(auto item:count) {\n            int len = item.first.second;\n            if(item.second>=3 && len >ans)\n                ans = len;\n        }\n        if(ans==0)\n            return -1;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-longest-special-substring-that-occurs-thrice-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
